## BirdHWA

Here's a cool plot:

```{r cars}
BirdHWA %>%
  filter(is.finite(YearInfested)) %>%
  nest(data=c(Infested, SpeciesTotal, Year)) %>%
  group_by(StateNum) %>%
  summarize(Year = median(YearInfested), .groups="drop_last") %>%
  arrange(Year) %>%
  mutate(StateNum = factor(StateNum, levels=rev(StateNum))) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=Year, xend=2018, y=StateNum, yend=StateNum)) +
  geom_segment(size=4)
```
